body.name: NEWISION Tablet 8 Inch,Android 13 Tablet 8GB RAM(4+4Expand) 64GB ROM,1TB Expand Tablet PC 1280x800 HD IPS Screen 5000mAh Battery,Dual Camera,Tablet with Bluetooth and WiFi,Type C, Tableta(Blue
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 4 hrs 47 mins
features: 【High Performance 8 inch Tablet】Android 13 enhances security and privacy features, adding a wealth of themes for users to choose from,and designing privacy and security and app permissions to give users full administrative rights for greater security and convenience.

【Large Capacity Tablet】B8 Tablet is featuring 8GB(4+4 Expand) RAM and 64GB ROM for faster and more stable running and storage speeds, and no longer stuttering when running several apps at once. It also has an TF card slot that can be plugged into 1TB of expanded memory, with the 64GB ROM, this tablet can store lots of music, pictures, videos.

【Download Multiple Social Apps】This android tablet is equipped with the latest Android 13 OS,which can download your favorite apps like Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, Netflix, Hulu and more through Google Play. It can gives you an ideal vision for working tasks, reading and entertainment.

【Dual Cameras and Slim Body】 Capture all the beautiful moments in your life with the tablet's dual camera. The 8MP rear-facing and 2MP front-facing cameras allow for super-smooth video chats and stunning photos and videos. It also features a stunning 1280* 800 HD IPS wide viewing angle screen that meets your basic daily needs. Its slim body and lightweight design (only 1.4 lb) make it easy to carry with you wherever you go.

【Connect With Wifi Bluetooth & Great Gift】This android tablet should be connect with 2.4G wifi.In order to auto-connect WiFi, you need to make initial settings in [Settings].What's more, before connecting a bluetooth device, make sure the tablet is ready to connect.This tablet pc is a great tablet suitable for kids,teens, parents and friends as an ideal Christmas, Birthday, Mother's Day, Father's Day and Valentine's Day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This tablet works just as well as any name brand device! So happy I found this! I love the size as it’s very comfortable in hand and as easy to carry around as a phone! When setting up the device does give iPhone/android users the ability to transfer there data or sync rather which I thought was amazing! I opted out as I wanted a device with a clean slate for business purposes. Love this tablet & how easy it is to use! I’m use to my iPads but this really worked just as smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Tablet Did Not Work
reviews.reviewText: Upon receiving the tablet, I opened it and tried to transfer the data from my android phone to the tablet. I did not have a cable with a C plug on each end, so I started the transfer via WIFI. The screen indicated that the process would take over two hours, so I left the phone and tablet next to each other and walked away. I returned about an hour later and the tablet was off. I tried to turn it back on, and it will not. The initial screen comes on for about a second, and then a red battery appears on the screen for a second or two before the screen goes black. I have tried to recharge the tablet with both the charger included with the tablet and a charger that I use for my phone, and the tablet does not accept any charge. Therefore, I am returning the tablet and purchasing another similar one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A nice second tablet…
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this tablet mainly to hold my last array of business and language learning apps. My iPad was getting overwhelmed and short on storage room so I wanted to move stuff off. This little tablet fit the bill, and for a really nice price. For my purposes it, covers all the bases. It is fast, the memory is adequate, although I added a flash card for more storage, the picture is really crystal clear, and it has WIFI and Bluetooth. For this price, it really works for me. The one negative is that cases and and screen protectors are almost impossible to find for this model. Big disappointment, so I had to minus one Star.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good tablet for the price
reviews.reviewText: The tablet comes with almost a full charge on arrival, was easy to set-up but took quite a bit more time to finally get it up and running.Pros ; The price is great, you get all the functionality of a premium tablet.Good for watching videos and simply cruising the internet in bed or wherever you desire. It's small enough to not be a burden to carry anywhere.Cons ;The tablet has a little delay and videos aren't the smoothest, meaning it has a slower refresh rate even when the video is 720-1080p but the actual display is crisp and clear.The battery life isn't the best but isn't the worst either, you'll maybe get roughly 2 1/2 to 3 hours of video streaming from a fill charge before having to plug it in. It doesn't take long to charge but maybe of you lower some settings or wear headphones may extend your battery life.The sound on this tablet is pretty bad. At max volume you'll have to be right near it to hear it. If there's background noise, such as doing dishes while using the tablet, you will not hear it. If you plan on using this tablet anywhere else buy at the quite of your own home, you'll absolutely need some headphones.All and all this is a decent starting tablet, it does everything other tablets at an affordable price point. Don't expect anything ground breaking, it's a tablet, it works. If you're looking to just browse the internet and stream video, this will be perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great starter tablet
reviews.reviewText: This would be great for an older person who just want to play games or read here and there or a child. The functionality is great, lightweight but durable, and overall a decent starter tablet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Volume is almost no existance
reviews.reviewText: Screen is rather slow on touch response, and major flaw was volume loudness that is horrible.I couldn't hear any music even volume is all the way up.So, I returned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not particularly inspiring
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my wife so she would have an extra tablet to work with. We have been iPad people forever so I wasn’t sure how it would go over. So far she hasn’t been using it much. It’s not that she isn’t happy with it she just doesn’t reach for it when her iPad is available. The screen is sharp and the battery seems to last long enough. She likes the smallish size too. If you are familiar with Android you should be fine with this. She was able to load some things off her iPhone onto this so there is that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Probably best suited for browsing and reading
reviews.reviewText: Admitedly, I have been spoiled by using an iPad for a number of years, so the performance issues with this tablet are fairly pronounced to me. Setup was simple and the wifi connection has remained stable. Battery life is not great. Playing one music video on YouTube and reading two chapters of an ebook, along with my basic setup, used up half of the battery charge. Video playback is noticeably stuttery, and Google Play Books crashed twice while I was reading. Unless you are holding the camera perfectly still and have a perfectly still subject, you will likely not get a decent photo. Casual browsing and reading are OK. For a bare budget, this is a decent starter tablet. I added a 512GB expansion card and eventually found the setting to set it up to use. You can either dedicate it to use only on the tablet or set it up to be able to transfer media back and forth with other devices.
